title: MBMBaM 603: A Cold One Between the Shoulders
description:
This episode has some notes of oud wood and creed green Irish tweed. It’s a little bit chewy with some sulfur undertones, and it’s a bit dry on the palate. In any case, there’s definitely some lingering wetness.

Suggested talking points: Bespoke TikToks, Time to Blast Off, Umami Water, Community Theater Shrek, Bosh, Clone Cologne

The National Asian Pacific American Women’s Forum: https://www.napawf.org/about 
Harmony House: https://harmonyhousewv.com/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Travis McElroy, Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy)
